Stephen Tomlinson
Work Email

Macmillan Organiser

Information Architecture

I prototyped the Macmillan Organiser to help people with cancer keep track of and store all the important information pertaining to their treatment. Bostock and Pollitt had created a paper version. I created a series of wireframes and then made them into a working prototype.
